snippet: Representative Heath Shuler, a three-term Democrat from North Carolina, has decided not to run for governor or for re-election.
abstract: Representative Heath Shuler, a three-term Democrat from North Carolina, has decided not to run for governor or for re-election.
lead_paragraph: Representative Heath Shuler of North Carolina, a three-term Democrat and a former professional quarterback, announced Thursday that he would not seek re-election.

headline.main: North Carolina Congressman Rejects Run for Governor or Re-Election
